revised_title: Discovery of Zincamide and Other Compounds Derived from Ammonia and Its Analogues
tldr: Edward Frankland discovers a new series of compounds derived from ammonia and its analogues, including zincamide, nitride of zinc, zincphenylimide, diethylzincamine, and zincoximide. These compounds are formed through the reaction of zincethyl with ammonia and other nitrogen compounds, replacing hydrogen atoms with zinc atoms.
